sentence.Network_en: Bobsledding has also been an Olympic event since the first Winter Games in 1924.
sentence.Network_cn: 雪橇运动也是从1924年冬奥会起成为奥运项目.

sentence.Network_en: Two events should be mentioned about ice sport, they are ice hockey and bobsledding.

the 11-day event , which included Nordic skiing , speed skating , skating , ice hockey and bobsledding , was a huge success and was retroactively called the first Olympic winter Games .这次活动持续了11天，比赛项目包括北欧滑雪、速度滑冰、花样滑冰，冰球和雪橇比赛。这次活动获得了巨大的成功，后来人们把这次活动称为第一届冬季奥
